segments.text: There's a problem with my credit card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me what the problem is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A charge came up on my bill that I didn't make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The charge was for a $ 350 purse , but I did not buy it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure that you didn't make that purchase ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would know if I bought something that expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I apologize . What day was this purchase made ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was bought on November 12th at 3
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , we'll do an investigation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Until this investigation is finished , will I have to pay for the charge ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you don't . We'll take care of it .
segments.speaker: S2
